languages.text: "Мы говорили о том, что каждый из нас видит мир по-своему. Ты жаждал{mf||а} знать, каким его видят эльдары. Ты все еще ждешь ответ?"
"We talked about how we each see the world in our own way. You were eager to know how Aeldari see the world. Do you still wish to hear the answer?"
languages.original_text: "Мы говорили о том, что каждый из нас видит мир по-своему. Ты жаждал{mf||а} знать, каким его видят эльдары. Ты все еще ждешь ответ?"

traits.locale_text: "We talked about how we each see the world in our own way. You were eager to know how Aeldari see the world. Do you still wish to hear the answer?"
"We talked about how we each see the world in our own way. You were eager to know how Aeldari see the world. Do you still wish to hear the answer?"
"We talked about how we each see the world in our own way. You were eager to know how Aeldari see the world. Do you still wish to hear the answer?"
"We talked about how we each see the world in our own way. You were eager to know how Aeldari see the world. Do you still wish to hear the answer?"

languages.text: «Hablamos sobre cómo veíamos el mundo cada uno a nuestro modo. Tenías mucho interés por saber cómo vemos el mundo los Aeldari. ¿Aún quieres oír la respuesta?».
languages.original_text: "We talked about how we each see the world in our own way. You were eager to know how Aeldari see the world. Do you still wish to hear the answer?"

traits.locale_text: «Hablamos sobre cómo veíamos el mundo cada uno a nuestro modo. Tenías mucho interés por saber cómo vemos el mundo los Aeldari. ¿Aún quieres oír la respuesta?».

languages.text: 「お互いにどんな視点で世界を見ているかについて話し合っただろう。お前はアエルダリが世界をどのように見ているのかを知りたがっていた。その答えを、今もまだ知りたいのか？」
languages.original_text: "We talked about how we each see the world in our own way. You were eager to know how Aeldari see the world. Do you still wish to hear the answer?"

traits.locale_text: 「お互いにどんな視点で世界を見ているかについて話し合っただろう。お前はアエルダリが世界をどのように見ているのかを知りたがっていた。その答えを、今もまだ知りたいのか？」

languages.text: “我们讨论过各自看待世界的不同方式。你当时想了解艾达灵族是如何看待世界的，你现在还想知道答案吗？”
languages.original_text: "We talked about how we each see the world in our own way. You were eager to know how Aeldari see the world. Do you still wish to hear the answer?"

traits.locale_text: “我们讨论过各自看待世界的不同方式。你当时想了解艾达灵族是如何看待世界的，你现在还想知道答案吗？”

languages.text: « Nous avons discuté des différences dans notre perception du monde et vous vouliez savoir comment les Aeldaris le voient. Souhaitez-vous toujours entendre ma réponse ? »
languages.original_text: "We talked about how we each see the world in our own way. You were eager to know how Aeldari see the world. Do you still wish to hear the answer?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons discuté des différences dans notre perception du monde et vous vouliez savoir comment les Aeldaris le voient. Souhaitez-vous toujours entendre ma réponse ? »

languages.text: "Wir haben darüber gesprochen, wie wir jeder die Welt auf unsere eigene Weise sehen. Ihr wolltet wissen, wie Aeldari die Welt sehen. Wollt Ihr die Antwort noch immer hören?"
languages.original_text: "We talked about how we each see the world in our own way. You were eager to know how Aeldari see the world. Do you still wish to hear the answer?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben darüber gesprochen, wie wir jeder die Welt auf unsere eigene Weise sehen. Ihr wolltet wissen, wie Aeldari die Welt sehen. Wollt Ihr die Antwort noch immer hören?"

languages.text: "İkimizin de dünyayı ne kadar farklı gördüğümüz hakkında konuşmuştuk. Aeldarilerin dünyayı nasıl gördüğünü öğrenmek istiyordun. Cevabı hâlâ merak ediyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "We talked about how we each see the world in our own way. You were eager to know how Aeldari see the world. Do you still wish to hear the answer?"

traits.locale_text: "İkimizin de dünyayı ne kadar farklı gördüğümüz hakkında konuşmuştuk. Aeldarilerin dünyayı nasıl gördüğünü öğrenmek istiyordun. Hâlâ cevabı merak ediyor musun?"
